text: North Bougainville District is a district of the Autonomous Region of Bougainville of Papua New Guinea. Its capital is Buka.Districts of Papua New Guinea at statoids.com North Bougainville languages are spoken in the district. ==References== Category:Districts of Papua New Guinea Category:Autonomous Region of Bougainville Category:Buka, Papua New Guinea
title: North Bougainville District
